EmailTemplate.description: Reply Paid predefined template for outbound comms for the the bulk mail onboarding case management team
EmailTemplate.name: Bulk Mail - Reply Paid Change of Details
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Customer Onboarding Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Customer Onboarding
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your enquiry about changes to your Reply Paid service. Please complete the Reply Paid application form which is available on our website - Reply Paid Application Form.
When updating your address, please note that the barcode is non-transferable. You may receive a new Reply Paid address and artwork. If you receive new artwork, please discard your old artwork and any printed envelopes. Also, make sure there are no active campaigns going to the old Reply Paid address.
Kind regards,
Customer Onboarding Australia Post
{!Case.Thread_Id}
